intro.about_me: I am a fullstack developer with experience in Delphi and Java, focused on desktop and web systems. Currently, I enjoy turning ideas into functional and efficient applications, whether by creating APIs with Spring Boot or modern interfaces with React!
intro.more_1: I have been developing and maintaining desktop applications and web systems for approximately 3 years, always striving for improvement through courses. My most recent experience was in agribusiness systems, where I implemented tools to optimize internal processes, such as automating manual tests and error reporting in Jenkins, improving issue detection efficiency.
intro.more_2: I have also led the development of management systems and database migrations to ensure compatibility and integrity. During this period, I was responsible for handling over 100 support tickets, always aiming for quick and effective solutions for clients.
intro.more_3: I am currently pursuing a degree in Software Analysis and Development to further expand my technical knowledge. I am always looking for new challenges to apply my skills and contribute to the success of the projects and companies I collaborate with.
